Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Peter and St. Paul:

Text.Language: <ere peniwt Petroc: nem pencaq Pauloc: pinis] n~ctulloc: ettajro n~nipictoc.
Hail to our father Peter: and our teacher Paul: the great pillars: for the firmness of the faithful.
السلام لابينا بطرس ومعلمنا بولس. العمودين العظيمين لثبات المؤمنين.
